website_summaries.verdict: Overall, the PlayStation Vita is the most advanced portable gaming system ever made. While the price is deceiving because of a hidden cost, gamers are getting an impressively complete package. Now priced at $200, the Vita makes a compelling case as the ultimate indie portable console.
pros: The PlayStation Vita delivers amazing visuals on its 5-inch OLED touch screen that look almost as good as PS3 graphics
The system's game lineup has matured into an indie haven, though AAA titles are scarce
The Vita allows for downloading of some games (including all first-party titles) over the PlayStation Network
The Vita's operating system is smartly designed, easy to use, and ultraresponsive
The unit feels great to hold and has excellent standby battery life
A lot of PSN titles can be purchased on PS3 and Vita for one price
cons: The Vita uses proprietary media and connections across the board, and even requires the purchase of a separate memory card to play most games and use most apps, which results in a hidden cost
Battery life could be better, and there's no way it can be replaced by the user
Also, some antipiracy implementations are a bit cumbersome to deal with (for example, mounting the Vita to a PC/Mac for file transfer)
It's also unclear how much storage the Vita has onboard, and it'll cost you more money for larger Vita Memory Cards

customer_reviews.title: Sonys proprietary cards are very expensive as well as being your only option.
customer_reviews.text: The Vita arrived in very good condition. The screen is in virtually flawless condition and everything else works nicely. My only complaint cannot be attributed to the seller, but rather Sony for not giving this thing any internal memory for downloads. Tracking down a memory card isn't going to be easy and retailers will try to gouge you real good on prices. My advice is to purchase a card with the vita or else you will only be able to use it for remote play until you get a card or game (and you still can't save).
customer_reviews.author: Joshua J. Romain

customer_reviews.title: Still a great handheld system!
customer_reviews.text: Bought from amazon warehouse deals on Prime day, was listed in good condition. All it needed was a good cleaning. Pleasantly surprised to find an 8gb Vita memory card included! Battery life has been great - the screen is plenty bright indoors even at minimum brightness. Getting about 6 hrs before needing charged. Only con - came with firmware 3.63.
customer_reviews.author: anactoraaron

customer_reviews.title: Works, but looks like crap.
customer_reviews.text: Came in pretty shabby condition, and i made sure to pay way extra for “very good” but was only good condition at best. Power chord was screwed up with the usb port litterally jammed in about 3/4 inches, a few irremovable blemishes on the screen itself, and dust and crud in the cracks between the buttons and cracks. I had to do the “Sanitizing” myself, and it was a bit of a dissapointment. Really horrid sanitation. It works but really bad presentation quality.
customer_reviews.author: Ramzey Sandoval

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: In short: Fully functional and capable, usual wear. Product has some dim marks on the screen which are visible when the brightness is XX and/or screen held 3 inches from one’s face, or when the screen is off; otherwise they will not be noticeable. Some scratches on outside casing but once again nothing too noticeable. Note: as usual it doesn’t come with a PlayStation Vita SIM Card; you will need one of these in order to play ANY game, even cartridge games. Regular SIM cards will not fit the Vita; you will need a proprietary one made by PlayStation.
customer_reviews.author: Hunter Brown

customer_reviews.title: Don’t believe the title, it’s not a bundle.
customer_reviews.text: Something to point out about this “bundle” since that’s what it is listed as: it is not a bundle. It is just the system and a cord. You have to buy a memory card. It doesn’t say that anywhere in the description so right away the title is misleading. Paid 140 dollars expecting a “bundle” since most places include the lowest possible memeory card with the system(ie gamestop, local video game shops) and just got a system. So make sure to check with the seller first on what it all includes.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher

customer_reviews.title: Pick the right seller!!!😧
customer_reviews.text: Dissapointed, I have to buy a memory card and charger now, since it only came with the system in some generic box
customer_reviews.author: Terrence O'Neal

customer_reviews.title: :) Happy to finaly have it back
customer_reviews.text: The Psvita is a FANTASTIC Device for a Multitude of Video camera Email and over all a Good Amount of Downloadable content. Not to mention my No.1 Favorit Aspect of the Vita In genral and to be Honest I was SHOCKED how Great it played Youtube Video o.o The only pet-Peeve with it Though Is the Slight Lack of the Previous Ps.2 Genration from Playstation network game downloads...I would LOVE to see the Atelier iris 1-3 Star ocean till the end of time... Otherwise Like I said Glad to have this back in my Possetion.
customer_reviews.author: charles elder

customer_reviews.title: Great display and resolution.
customer_reviews.text: Love the PS Vita. The display is sharp and the resolution is amazing. The console is ergonomically well-designed. I recommend this handheld if you can find one.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Blackmore

customer_reviews.title: Actually a really good, and good feeling system
customer_reviews.text: Actually a really good, and good feeling system. Have not seen the Model 2000 screen, but the OLED screen is absolutely gorgeous. The small library of games is partially remedied by the lack of region locking, though I do recommend looking around outside of Amazon to see if you can get Singaporean or other English translations of games not released in NA. One major drawback is the requirement for memory to even play games, and the price of said memory.
customer_reviews.author: Ben Hill

customer_reviews.title: Vita is Amazing
customer_reviews.text: I've had my Vita for almost a year now, having picked it up at launch. All I can say is Wow. This has been my go to handheld since I got it. Uncharted, Gravity Rush and Persona 4 are all incredible, not to mention being able to play many of my favorite square enix games on the go(FFVII anyone?). I like my 3ds and love Zelda, Mario, and Professor Layton games but most of my playtime goes to the Vita. Can't wait to see what this next year holds for it!
customer_reviews.author: Bill Brasky

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Not happy that this came with no memory whatsoever! Spent 119$ on that plus a game for 10$ now I gotta spend more money just do my son can use the dang thing!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my son as a high school graduation gift. He loves it and plays it way more than I thought he would considering he has a PS3, Xbox 360 too. But I have seen him using this for the past few months regularly. He even uses the Skype on it to talk to his friends instead of his cell phone... I am happy with this purchase because it must be pretty awesome for my son not to use his other game systems or cell phone while he is at home.
customer_reviews.author: Vysiuene

customer_reviews.title: My favorite hand held gadget.
customer_reviews.text: I simply love having this device at hand wherever I go. I got Playsation Plus and get access to free games and great deals on digital content all the time. I use the browser daily and an update made the internet browser even better. Even though I've only used the 3G feature for one month, I'm still very happy with the Platation Vita. The 5" OLED touch screen is beautiful and responsive, the AAA games have amazing quality (like having a Playstation 3 console wherever you go) and useful apps like youtube which I use quite a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Zin Armagadan

customer_reviews.title: DJMAX and Persona 4
customer_reviews.text: That's really all there is to play on it. Gravity rush is fun but short and Zero Escape is awesome but I'm not sure if those are the best reasons to but this device. the bundle benefits only come if you subscribe to At&T service. They really need more games... At pitch black darkness, you can see the affxer (glue type thing) that binds the Amoled to the s***ty plastic covering that sony uses on the front of the Vita. It leads to a distracting and uneven blackness on the screen.
customer_reviews.author: Soiidus

customer_reviews.title: Probably not worth it
customer_reviews.text: Not very good at all. It has a battery problem that claims the battery isn't charged and/or is low so I can only play it while plugged in; and even then I can only play it for maybe an hour or so before it overheats and shuts down. Decent system, but wouldn't buy from here again.
customer_reviews.author: Taz

customer_reviews.title: Works well but needed some cleaning.
customer_reviews.text: When the system arrived I was not aware that it was a Japanese model, but that is no big deal since the system is region free. I was a little disappointed to see how dirty the system was compared to what I paid for it, but other than that it works well so I am satisfied. Would recommend.👍
customer_reviews.author: scotland burlison

customer_reviews.title: A good bundle
customer_reviews.text: This was a great price (got it on sale) for the PS Vita 3g version, but At&T are complete (fill in the blanks) and want way too much money for 3g service. In fact AT&T needs some great competition to help them calm down. To be honest, the Vita does not feel like there is a plan to keep games coming, but there have been some AAA title announcements and there will be integration with the new PS4.
customer_reviews.author: J. Keller

customer_reviews.title: good but still needs more
customer_reviews.text: overall the vita is a great handheld in terms of hardware and graphics but the lack in a variety of games out so far makes it difficult to want to play it often. its a step up to the psp but a step way down from the psp's gaming library. sure the playstation network offers some more game opportunities via download at a price but the download time and storage space take up just makes it too much of a hassle. If the Vita gets a larger gaming library (hopefully similar to the ps3's) then i would absolutely love this handheld.
customer_reviews.author: kurlster

customer_reviews.title: Bought USED
customer_reviews.text: I enjoy my PS Vita more than I do playing my wife's 3DS. Which is surprising becasue I didn't really enjoy all that much the PSP when it was sitll around. Now I am hoping that some of the PSP games are re-released physically as I would love to play some of those gems on the PS Vita's better control, media managment, and connectivity with the internet and stauts updates to facebook and such when you complete trophies.
customer_reviews.author: C. Wheat

customer_reviews.title: Bare minimum...
customer_reviews.text: This came with the bare minimum. Just the system on the power adapter. No memory card or instruction materials.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Rivera

customer_reviews.title: game selection sucks ass, no big name titles lined up
customer_reviews.text: The vita was dead in the water when it was made, yet I still wanted one...game selection sucks ass, no big name titles lined up. And the support for this thing seems non existent. Heck some stores don't even carry vita or it's games. Which is why, I ended up getting rid of mine.
customer_reviews.author: Bernardo Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful portable gaming house!
customer_reviews.text: I have a PSP-3000 series and I was worried that the Vita might be a slightly better but my fears went away as soon as I have started to game in this bad boy. Fantastic product, Sony's quality and now with a great game library and great price. Better to buy before it moves to the slim version (have read it is not as great as this phat model in some aspects, like the screen type). Highly recommended!

customer_reviews.title: Broke the mold...
customer_reviews.text: Both of my kids have basically retired all of their other game systems for this one. It is everything all in one. Unfortunately, the game selection is a bit limited. If more don't come, they might just being going back to the old ones... This game system definitely seems to be geared more for older teens and young adults.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie T

customer_reviews.title: Starting to like because I can watch neflix on a ok screen ...
customer_reviews.text: Starting to like because I can watch neflix on a ok screen it's glass ig too so that's nice ig. Can't watch YouTube and games look kinda limited. Im also surprised sonny didn't make it to were you could play umd movies

customer_reviews.title: Not a bundle anymore
customer_reviews.text: It's not a bundle it's just a 3g PS Vita, so it only gets 4 stars because I swear when I bought it I swear I saw a picture of a memory card and the whole "bundle" title kinda lead me to believe that there would be a memory card. So make sure you get a memory card if you order this PS Vita.
customer_reviews.author: les

customer_reviews.title: Best portable gaming system ever
customer_reviews.text: What can I say about this system? Its absolutely awesome. The display is crisp, vivid, beautiful. I love watching Netflix, YouTube, Hulu Plus etc. Works flawlessly. I am currently playing Mortal Kombat on it and its awesome. Just like the console version. I highly recommend this game and system. Best portable gaming system on the market. Only problem is that the volume is a bit low, even at its highest setting. I suggest headphones.

customer_reviews.title: Wish there were more cool games out on the vita
customer_reviews.text: I love it... and now with the remote play feature with the ps3 and ps4 it helps me play my games when my tv is occupied, only objection i have with vita is the lack of mainstream hardcore game releases. expecting games like god of war, battlefield, bioshock, castlevania, dmc, splinter cell, hitman, tomb raider etc to make a version for the vita but looks like that's not happening anytime soon :(

customer_reviews.title: Not good

customer_reviews.title: It's a good used PS Vita

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE IT
customer_reviews.text: The vita is great, and a huge step-up from its big brother PSP. I have found myself constantly using it, and carrying it with me. It's great for people who want to be able to relax and play some of their old favorites and find a few new ones. Or those who want a limited tablet like object that can access email, Facebook, YouTube and many other internet applications.

customer_reviews.text: Battery was bad. It goes from 50c/o to low in less than a second.

customer_reviews.title: Game Hog of a fiance ...
customer_reviews.text: I helped my fiance purchase this game as a Christmas gift. If I ever need to find his face, it's usually glued to this game if it isn't glued on me ... Lol! All jokes aside, this is a neat little handheld. I'm not that technologically literate, so I don't know how to use all the features on it. As for everything I have played with on it, it is very fast and has a great picture on the screen when playing Persona.
customer_reviews.author: Tad

customer_reviews.title: Quick delivery and works perfectly

customer_reviews.text: OLED is really solid up close I am excited to use the device to its full potential. I was fortunate to get my hands on a bundle deal, huge shout out to the crew who boxed this up. I was amazingly thrilled with the quality of the unit irregardless of age.

customer_reviews.text: It's a great product for gaming so smart phones do so much more of the additional functions at a much higher speed and more efficiently. However I love the RPG and strategy games and being able to play them on the road.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Arch

customer_reviews.title: The item arrived on time and as described just that ...
customer_reviews.text: The item arrived on time and as described just that I had to go to google on how to reset it before I could use it
customer_reviews.author: Luis

customer_reviews.title: Works great though, good product
customer_reviews.text: Bummed it didn't come with a memory card, should have read description closer. Works great though, good product.
customer_reviews.author: TRACY ANDERSON

customer_reviews.title: Everything I expected!
customer_reviews.text: I have had EVERY Playstation unit that has ever been released... I bought a used ("Very Good" condition) unit, and when it came it already had a PSN account associated with it, but Sony's Playstation Support walked me through getting rid of it and connecting it to my own. Took me about 3.5 hours to wipe it clean, connect it to my PSN account, and download all of the Vita games I had unlocked. I only got a few hours to actually play it, but the graphics are awesome and the system itself is smooth and easy to navigate. Connecting to Wifi, computer, or PS3 was a breeze. For a handheld, this little thing rocks!
customer_reviews.author: Todd

customer_reviews.title: Vita craze!
customer_reviews.text: Got it on time, in brand new condition. I was worried bc under lighted areas I could see bubbles under my screen, I looked this up online & it's true for all vita products for the special touchscreen. I love my vita. For this price to have the wifi/3G & 8gb memory is insane, best vita deal out there!
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Underrated System
customer_reviews.text: Love the Vita, especially the original model with its superior OLED screen. The only bummer about it is the overpriced proprietary memory cards but those are slowly dropping in price. I would especially recommend it to anyone who enjoys JRPGs as this is the perfect system for it. Been going through my favorite classic FF games and those alone have provided hundreds of hours of enjoyment.
customer_reviews.author: 2EZ4U2C

customer_reviews.text: i love this thing. i have psp and just could not get into it. however, with the additional analog stick (right) on the vita, you WILL get immersed in the games! great graphics, skype works great. i highly recommend this if you are a gamer!

customer_reviews.title: Great Handheld
customer_reviews.text: My daughter (6) saved up her birthday and Christmas money to buy it, just like her brother (7) did. She plays it fairly often and it seems to be worth the money. I highly recommend getting the PlayStation Plus to go with it, though, for the free games every month.
customer_reviews.author: Pashta

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: WELL NEVERMIND after looking this over. the product was said to be 'Very good' condition but not only was the device dirty and the backpiece scratched and scuffed up the Memory card holder area was busted and bent on the INSIDE.. all this hype for nothing
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Santiago

customer_reviews.title: Still early, but...
customer_reviews.text: Overall, the Vita is a well done portable gaming system. I used the PSP for a while, and the DS, GameBoys, etc... I have always been a fan of the portable gaming market. I had pretty high expectations for this as Sony really talked this up. Overall, I am pretty happy with getting it. The graphics are a large improvement, and the gameplay finally feels full fledges as opposed to the portable version where generally you lose most of the features of the console version. You still see that at times on the Vita, but I'm sure as time goes on that will only get better and better. If you play portable games a lot, you will probably enjoy it.
customer_reviews.author: begoldn

customer_reviews.title: Playstation got it right
customer_reviews.text: Oh man the Vita is amazing. I was hesitant because I already have all the DS handheld systems, but this is great! You get to play the best JRPGs and the layout is great. I haven't had much trouble with it so far, wish I'd gotten one earlier.
customer_reviews.author: Sakura x JuriTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Fast shipping.

customer_reviews.title: Runs Perfectly
customer_reviews.text: Product runs as if it were new. Even remote play with my PS4 works smoothly. No show of ware or tear either. Would highly recommend.

customer_reviews.title: Remote play!
customer_reviews.text: He loved it. And he doesn't hog the tv. Win win. Can remote play.

customer_reviews.title: Check it before sending it.
customer_reviews.text: It would be 5 stars but the cord that came with the system for charging the ps vita, well, if I didn't have a back up cord, I would've been faced with returning the whole thing. I'm glad it turned out better than the 'jot script' (stylist pin) I had to send back cause of it not working. But hey, what a nice return chat help; to save another malfunctioning day. Especially when the return link on Amazon was malfunctioning as well.
customer_reviews.author: Ebon Collins

customer_reviews.title: Expectations were overly met!
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the only sellers who legitimately had the correct product, being new, not a slim model, unopened and not some bundle he/she put together.

customer_reviews.text: What more can i say this system is the best out there that is portable !! plus im so excited about when the ps4 come's out i can play ps4 games on the go !! easy to use and excellent graphics sounds great it just great

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Came in good condition. It works comes with case and charger and a Game, which I believe is random ( mine was call of duty). Came with system software or frimware 3.57. Oh and also came with an 8gb memory card
customer_reviews.author: S. Faheem

customer_reviews.title: Not a bad bargain.
customer_reviews.text: I saw this on sale and decided to get it. i was pissed at first becse i saw a crack or scratch on the screnen but this is barely noticeable. it also came with an 8 gb mem card so that made me happy. Its a good system to have. sadly there is no flash player so you cant view videos on browser. I paid 200.97 becuse of 1 day shipping which is still cheaper than what it originally costs plus included was the 8 gb card. Id say gor for it, cant beat this price.
customer_reviews.author: Mark R

customer_reviews.title: PS VIta A Good Substitute
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my son who is deployed and without his gaming systems; so far so good; he is enjoying it and likes the features; great display for a handheld device. Downloading games is very slow though and I recommend purchasing the SD cards instead.
customer_reviews.author: Denise Comilloni

customer_reviews.title: Good Product Great Condition Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Just got mine in the mail a few days ago I'm really liking it It says screen has a couple scratches on it but when mine came it didn't the screen look brand new just letting anyone who's turned this down know

customer_reviews.title: I love it
customer_reviews.text: I love my Ps vita its really nice and very easy to use and very light. I didn't get any games for it but you get free ones once you get your account going. I don't know how the plan works but without it you can still get online and search stuff and get on facebook. If your a Playstation fan and want a handheld this is for you.
customer_reviews.author: Dylan

customer_reviews.title: Good console!
customer_reviews.text: Haven't had a single issue (well anything that couldn't be fixed) with the system, though my vita was supposed to be both Wi-Fi AND 3G, it ended up being just the Wi-Fi console. Have a rather large library of games now.

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend to anyone
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this game. Haven't had any issues with it. Would recommend to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Kim Crumley

customer_reviews.title: VITA 3G/Wifi
customer_reviews.text: I won't go over details and stuff about the vita because there is a lot of reviews so far out there, but in general i like the idea of Sony of taking a step further they handheld devices, the console is overall good still there is room for improvements on the console like the remote and cross play which i hope Sony has plans for. Still getting used to smaller controllers, my hands are big so is annoying sometimes because my fingers touch the back touch pad without me noticing.
customer_reviews.author: Edwin Martinez

customer_reviews.title: I really enjoy my vita
customer_reviews.text: If you already have PS+ you will find a several nice free games and if you have PS4, the remote play experience is just GREAT. don't hesitate to buy this one. Its a solid buy.
customer_reviews.author: Oscar Rdx

customer_reviews.title: Good system but needs games
customer_reviews.text: Its a good system but like the headline says it needs games. When I first purchased it most of the games out now weren't out but now it has a few games worth diving into for people who've never played them on other systems but most except for a few have been rehashes so until the system gets some must own titles ill be sticking to mostly psp titles.

customer_reviews.title: I love PlayStation Vita :D
customer_reviews.text: This device is AWESOME :D I love it and I play everyday. Actually I spend a lot of my time on it instead of studying. :( Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Mohammad H. Jeffrey

customer_reviews.title: Psvita
customer_reviews.text: The system is great ,but when u say bundle I was expecting more. Most bundles gives you more like game,screen cleaner or other devices goes to system to make a bundle.But next time pop don't order off amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Compton

customer_reviews.title: Product is good
customer_reviews.text: I like sony products.But No any idea why i purchased this console. But for the product itself, it is good new generation portable game console. For myself, I barely touch PsV, and have no games to play.
customer_reviews.author: Meatycow

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: A wonderful device, I thought I would love to play a lot with this console.
customer_reviews.author: Jorge Harris

customer_reviews.title: Can't Beat the Vita for Convenience
customer_reviews.text: A great gaming device, all the boys love it. Convenience, portability and entertainment factor. Did you know you can watch Netflix on this and take photos as well?
customer_reviews.author: RosAnn

customer_reviews.title: broken
customer_reviews.text: It does not work, it is broken. Waiting for something much better and here I am wasting my time
customer_reviews.author: Jeffry G

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my son and he loves it. He is 16 years old and has found so many apps that are helpful with appointments, schedules, etc as well as all the fun games he has downloaded. I don't recommend for younger kids!
customer_reviews.author: Nikki

customer_reviews.title: Too Pricey and is Locked to AT&T
customer_reviews.text: Paid a bit too much for this product. I was not aware there were two versions of the PS Vita and we got the one that you need an AT&T data plan with and we have T-Mobile. My grandson likes it, but I wish I would of known there were two different versions.
customer_reviews.author: Paula

customer_reviews.title: ... an accessory for my nephew's gift and it was perfect addition to his gift
customer_reviews.text: It was an accessory for my nephew's gift and it was perfect addition to his gift.
customer_reviews.author: Eunice C.

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Very neat system - syncs with the PSN seamlessly. I don't have AT&T, so I couldn't use the 3G, but wasn't interested in that anyway. Even when I'm at home, I can't stop playing. If you'd like to feel like you have a portable PS3 in your hands, this is the way to do it!
customer_reviews.author: Jamie A Kelley

customer_reviews.title: Nice buy
customer_reviews.text: My eight year ole nephew loves it, it works well and came with what was advertised, even my friends 30 yr old brother loved it
customer_reviews.author: lntm440

customer_reviews.title: I bought this for my son's birthday and assumed, ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my son's birthday and assumed, after reading the Q&A, that there would be a 4GB memory card included. Imagine our surprise when my son opened this on his birthday and couldn't play it. We are sending it back after finding the exact same product elsewhere, and for $89 less, allowing us to get the device and the card for around the same price as this one. Very deceptive to have a Q&A that doesn't actually reflect the purchase. Seller should be keeping an eye on their page to make sure it reflects their product. Buyer beware!
customer_reviews.author: K. Hale

customer_reviews.title: Good Product!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my son as x-mas gift. "The best gift ever" per my son. Seems to be of good quality. So far the product has been worth it.

customer_reviews.title: perfect boy gift
customer_reviews.text: This right here...is the gift your bf will die for.

customer_reviews.title: I give it a five star rating. A thumbs up for gaming fans.
customer_reviews.text: PlayStation Vita 3G/Wi-Fi Bundle Sony I give it a five star rating. A definite thumbs up for all gaming fans.

customer_reviews.title: Winner!
customer_reviews.text: 13 year old son was pleasantly surprised for Christmas 2012 with this gift ... he thanked me over and over!!

customer_reviews.title: So far, so good
customer_reviews.text: It came wrapped in paper but no damage, fast shipping. Looks great works great so far only had it for less than 24 hours now. Just didn't know that it requires a Sim Card for certain applications to work.

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Pricy, but I love it. Has lots of options, is a great all around media player. One of the better purchases I've made in my life.

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: Great buy and I am so happy I have this now. I will recommend this to friends, family , and others

customer_reviews.title: ps vita
customer_reviews.text: this product is totally worth the money it costes to buy it.the product i got was in great condition and i got it way sooner than i expected

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars

feature_bullets: Game with Dual Analog Sticks for precision control
Play a wide range of PS4 games on PS Vita system with Remote Play
Experience a growing library of games at your fingertips
Over 900 games available to play on PS Vita system through PSN, including new hits, PS one Classics, PS Mobile games, and more
Experience brilliant gaming with the 5" OLED touchscreen
Experience touch screen controls available on PS Vita system
